name: Lockdown Simulator (BrokoLee)
description: Lockdown Simulator is a lifesimulator that was created during the corona lockdown. You as the player have to keep the test subject inside theier apartment as long as possible. Every day you have a fixed amount of action points you can use to fulfill the needs of your subject. Creativ, culinaric, sport and social needs have to be fulfilled as good as possible to keep the subjects will to go outside low. You can also manipulate the subject with a social media minigame on theier pc to ceep theier desire to go outside low, but dont overdoo it or the subject will become suspicious.The more the suspicion or desire for freedome of your subject rises, the more agency you as a player loose over your subject and the simulation beginns to glitch from time to time. Can you get the Highscore for ceeping your subject in the longest? Find out now!
